comment.author: Danielle
comment.text: First, she called me a "TACO BOWL," for being Mexican. What's with all the name calling and insults?? Next, Hillary called me uneducated when I mostly likely have more degrees and certificates than she ever had. NOW, #HILLARY has the guts to call me DEPLORABLE???? Simply for supporting Trump??? Wth?? And my taxes pay her salary??? THIS DEPLORABLE, UNEDUCATED, TACO BOWL IS SMART ENOUGH TO LOVE AMERICA FIRST AND IS VOTING #TRUMP!!!! #MAKEAMERICAGREATAGAIN #MEXICANSFORTRUMP #TACOBOWLSVOTETRUMP #BASKETOFDEPLORABLES #TRUMPFORPRESIDENT

replies.author: Nicholas
replies.text: You are a fellow servant of God Danielle and I'm proud to be a fellow servant with you Rev 19:10 :-)

replies.author: Danielle
replies.text: I have 2 BACHELORS almost 2 Master degrees. Came here LEGALLY with a hired attorney.from Mexico.. my family worked 3 jobs to pay for him. We all came here LEGALLY and none of us have ever lived on WELFARE reorganization food stamps. We are all well off financially and we we LOVE AMERICA FIRST!!! THIS MEXICAN DEPLORABLE IS VOTING FOR TRUMP!!!! #LEGALIMMIGRANTSLOVETRUMP #BASKETOFDEPLORABLES #trump #mucicandeplorablesvotetrump

replies.author: Danielle
replies.text: #DEPLORABLES UNITED TO DESTROY THE PANTSUIT!!!!! Hillary, I am in that basket too. There's a reason why people support you. They need a liar who will tell them what they want to hear and continue to do the complete opposite. For Trump's supporters, we are not blind anymore. That basket will be your worst nightmare soon. UNEDUCTAED??I have 2 BACHELORS almost 2 Master Degrees. Came here LEGALLY with a hired attorney from Mexico..my family worked THREE jobs to pay for him. We all came here LEGALLY and none of us have ever lived on WELFARE reorganization food stamps. We are all well off financially and we we LOVE AMERICA FIRST!!! THIS MEXICAN DEPLORABLE IS VOTING FOR TRUMP!!!! #LEGALIMMIGRANTSLOVETRUMP #BASKETOFDEPLORABLES #DEPLORABLESFORTRUMP #BOYCOTTHILLARY #STOPTHEPANSUIT #BASKETOFDEPLORABLES #TRUMPFORPRESIDENT #MAKEAMERICAGREATAGAIN #MEXICANSFORTRUMP

replies.author: Nicholas
replies.text: Thank you for the Hashtags Danielle I'll start using them tomorrow. It's sleepy time with dreams of a #TrumpNation :-)
